outputs.output_descr:
- Emergency support measures are carried out on selected sites in accordance with the bi-communal list supplied by the TCCH for emergency interventions.
- Awareness of the Cypriot and international communities about the ongoing project activities is raised through public awareness campaigns in order to place an emphasis on the significance of Cyprus cultural heritage.
- TCCH is supported  in their efforts to preserve Cyprus' cultural heritage and set an example of positive cooperation and common sense of responsibility.
- Visual materials are identified and communication material about the results achieved by the project are prepared.

project_title: Support for the cultural heritage monuments II
